attributes.action: To revisit Matt Hancock dyslexia bill children assessed at primary school,
attributes.additional_details: It is so important to address this issue because otherwise there made to feel they stupid lazy which not right these children are normaly bright and with the right help go to be successful like other children, if this not address then they get frustrated and turn to crime and imprisonment
attributes.background:
To enable children to be assessed for dyslexia at primary school level so there it is addressed thought out there whole time in there education 
To make it compulsory in teacher training to diagnose dyslexia, and also to have teachers that are already trained to have additional training

rejection.details:
The Bill has started being debated in the House of Commons and is scheduled to be considered again in March 2023

https://bills.parliament.uk/bills/3208
